custom.name: A Set of Won Valuable Documents

abilities.name: All Eyes on... Me!
abilities.description: You may expend your special armor to resist an allied characters consequence from detection, or to push yourself to impress others. You can always make a grand entrance.

abilities.name: Gamblers Gift
abilities.description: When someone fools you or takes you by surprise, gain a free 1 Grit flashback. When you gather information while partying or gambling, gain +1 Effect.

abilities.name: Cutting Cards
abilities.description: Your skill with cards is mesmerizing. While you perform a card trick, you may alter a memory, implant a suggestion, or sow a doubt. You may use your playing cards as dangerous throwing weapons.

abilities.name: Heart of the Cards
abilities.description: When you accept Position and Effect given by the GM for a roll as is and just let the dice decide, don’t spend any Grit, or push the situation (you can still accept a Devil’s Bargain), regain 1 Grit.

abilities.name: Fight with Panache
abilities.description: When you fight in a duel, bystanders won’t interfere. If you use Sling while being in close combat, gain +1 Effect.

abilities.name: Saloon Swagger
abilities.description: Gain +1d in situations where your appearance would be an advantage. If you try to sway someone with a profitable proposition or challenge others to a duel, gain Potency.

abilities.name: Miss Fortune
abilities.description: Some call you lucky but truth be told, bad shit just happens to folk, who try to mess with you. You may win every game of chance. Spend 1 Grit to cause a minor accident (a jammed gun), 2 for a major one (an exploding stick of dynamite) or 3 for a catastrophe (a collapsing mine shaft). During Payout, gain +Doom equal to the highest amount of Grit spent this way.

abilities.name: Veteran
abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.
